00018 /****************************************************
00019  * resolve expression
00020  ****************************************************/
00021 static std::string unparsePowerpcRegister(const RegisterDescriptor &rdesc)
00022 {
00023     const RegisterDictionary *rdict = RegisterDictionary::dictionary_powerpc();
00024     std::string name = rdict->lookup(rdesc);
00025     if (name.empty()) {
00026         std::cerr <<"unparsePowerpcRegister(" <<rdesc <<"): register descriptor not found in dictionary.\n";
00027         //std::cerr <<rdict;
00028         ROSE_ASSERT(!"register descriptor not found in dictionary");
00029     }
00030     return name;
00031 }
00032 
00033 /* Helper for unparsePowerpcExpression(SgAsmExpression*) */
00034 static std::string unparsePowerpcExpression(SgAsmExpression* expr, const AsmUnparser::LabelMap *labels, bool useHex) {
00035     std::string result = "";
00036     if (expr == NULL) return "BOGUS:NULL";
00037     switch (expr->variantT()) {
00038         case V_SgAsmBinaryAdd:
00039             result = unparsePowerpcExpression(isSgAsmBinaryExpression(expr)->get_lhs(), labels, false) + " + " +
00040                      unparsePowerpcExpression(isSgAsmBinaryExpression(expr)->get_rhs(), labels, false);
00041             break;
00042         case V_SgAsmMemoryReferenceExpression: {
00043             SgAsmMemoryReferenceExpression* mr = isSgAsmMemoryReferenceExpression(expr);
00044             SgAsmExpression* addr = mr->get_address();
00045             switch (addr->variantT()) {
00046                 case V_SgAsmBinaryAdd: {
00047                     SgAsmBinaryAdd* a = isSgAsmBinaryAdd(addr);
00048                     std::string lhs = unparsePowerpcExpression(a->get_lhs(), labels, false);
00049                     if (isSgAsmValueExpression(a->get_rhs())) {
00050                         // Sign-extend from 16 bits
00051                         SgAsmValueExpression *ve = isSgAsmValueExpression(a->get_rhs());
00052                         assert(ve!=NULL);
00053                         result = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(
00054                                    (int64_t)IntegerOps::signExtend<16, 64>(SageInterface::getAsmConstant(ve)));
00055                         result += "(" + lhs + ")";
00056                     } else {
00057                         result = lhs + ", " + unparsePowerpcExpression(a->get_rhs(), labels, false);
00058                     }
00059                     break;
00060                 }
00061                 default:
00062                     result = "(" + unparsePowerpcExpression(addr, labels, false) + ")";
00063                     break;
00064             }
00065             break;
00066         }
00067         case V_SgAsmPowerpcRegisterReferenceExpression: {
00068             SgAsmPowerpcRegisterReferenceExpression* rr = isSgAsmPowerpcRegisterReferenceExpression(expr);
00069             result = unparsePowerpcRegister(rr->get_descriptor());
00070             break;
00071         }
00072         case V_SgAsmByteValueExpression:
00073         case V_SgAsmWordValueExpression:
00074         case V_SgAsmDoubleWordValueExpression:
00075         case V_SgAsmQuadWordValueExpression: {
00076             uint64_t v = SageInterface::getAsmConstant(isSgAsmValueExpression(expr));
00077             if (useHex) {
00078                 result = StringUtility::intToHex(v);
00079             } else {
00080                 result = StringUtility::numberToString(v);
00081             }
00082             if (labels) {
00083                 AsmUnparser::LabelMap::const_iterator li = labels->find(v);
00084                 if (li!=labels->end())
00085                     result += "<" + li->second + ">";
00086             }
00087             break;
00088         }
00089         default: {
00090             std::cerr << "Unhandled expression kind " << expr->class_name() << std::endl;
00091             ROSE_ASSERT (false);
00092         }
00093     }
00094     if (expr->get_replacement() != "") {
00095         result += " <" + expr->get_replacement() + ">";
00096     }
00097     return result;
00098 }

00101 std::string unparsePowerpcMnemonic(SgAsmPowerpcInstruction *insn) {
00102     ROSE_ASSERT(insn!=NULL);
00103     return insn->get_mnemonic();
00104 }
00105 
00107 std::string unparsePowerpcExpression(SgAsmExpression *expr, const AsmUnparser::LabelMap *labels) {
00108     /* Find the instruction with which this expression is associated. */
00109     SgAsmPowerpcInstruction *insn = NULL;
00110     for (SgNode *node=expr; !insn && node; node=node->get_parent()) {
00111         insn = isSgAsmPowerpcInstruction(node);
00112     }
00113     ROSE_ASSERT(insn!=NULL);
00114 
00115     PowerpcInstructionKind kind = insn->get_kind();
00116     bool isBranchTarget = (((kind == powerpc_b ||
00117                              kind == powerpc_bl ||
00118                              kind == powerpc_ba ||
00119                              kind == powerpc_bla) &&
00120                             expr==insn->get_operandList()->get_operands()[0]) ||
00121                            ((kind == powerpc_bc ||
00122                              kind == powerpc_bcl ||
00123                              kind == powerpc_bca ||
00124                              kind == powerpc_bcla) &&
00125                             insn->get_operandList()->get_operands().size()>=3 &&
00126                             expr==insn->get_operandList()->get_operands()[2]));
00127     return unparsePowerpcExpression(expr, labels, isBranchTarget);
00128 }
